data.description:
PUNCH FIT is an MR-enabled app that lets you enjoy boxing workouts anywhere, anytime. 
Even beginners can easily have effective workouts, with a variety of options to keep things fresh.
Itâ€™s packed with features to help keep you motivated, and it's highly rated by experienced boxers. 
Let's start exercising together!

+++

# FULLY MR-COMPATIBLE
With MR compatibility, you can enjoy workouts easily in any location. 
Of course, it also supports VR.
![{"height":912,"type":"image","width":1712}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75230038_4667556543468854_8242817811834050758_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=doo88s9EUuAQ7kNvgFqiecU&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAAlVIM6oaCT4g7bWn_NLyoetonJ4mEK7x3sYd23kOUfQ&oe=6706621D)

# OVER 100 WORKOUTS
We offer a variety of workouts with different difficulty levels and durations. 
You can also filter and save your favorites.
![{"height":913,"type":"image","width":1712}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38984459_1576476903229663_8543526547889504215_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ko3WFGe46wkQ7kNvgEowmvQ&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCzgTv70lV9JmTiw6MqTFna6knC5ETLn_5L_3925E730Q&oe=6706767D)

# MISSIONS TO KEEP YOU GOING
By setting daily and weekly missions as goals, you can continue exercising in a fun and engaging way.
![{"height":911,"type":"image","width":1712}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031307_1732633554147432_825388632096175663_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8D9mDkjuPvYQ7kNvgG7075J&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuLQgJYxZlNLachFXD2kOSVw3UVzj9KOG1MwHWW1hVMw&oe=67066731)

# OVER 100 REWARDS
Earn tickets and drops through exercising to unlock packs. You can collect over 100 different skins.
![{"height":913,"type":"image","width":1712}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974469_549670710853003_3916458436094720897_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mVI2yL8gk-oQ7kNvgEg2CYv&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC7XyBFtIBY6yGsASiTMfj3RR-oy-Z0e88-Hy67jnppIQ&oe=6706506A)

+++

Various Updates in Progress.
---
We wish you all the best in your health.

changelog.change_log:
*Adjusted vibration feedback to the controller when punching.
Effects, sounds, vibrations and drop points change with weak and strong punches.

*Calorie consumption display adjustment.
A mistake was made in the calorie notation at the time of results, which has been corrected.
We recommend using Quest's Move app to record calories and exercise.

*Fixed other minor bugs.

*Mixed Reality Capture by "LIV" is now supported.
https://www.liv.tv/
We look forward to seeing videos of you all playing PunchFit.

*Southpaw style play is now supported.
You can select the basic stance from the settings.

*Voice guidance has been adjusted.
Clarified straight and jab after dodge.

Enjoy,
